Reviews.Title: Great Point and Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: JBebe
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera about a year and a half ago and I have loved it. It takes great pictures (I am sure the newer models with more megapixels are even better) and has a lot of different settings.This camera takes videos with great sound and can also record sound all by itself. You can also record a sound clip to go with a photo. It zooms in pretty far and takes pretty good pictures even when it is all the way zoomed in.I use lithium batteries and they last a long time in this camera - and I take pictures EVERY DAY. I have taken thousands and thousands of pictures with this camera and it is still working really well.The only problem I have had is that lately when the battery runs out, the camera shuts off and the lens won't retract back into the camera until I put new batteries in.This is a great camera, and I love it because it is red! It is very cute.

Reviews.Title: seller information
Reviews.Author: R. Crank
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera years ago and after searching the web found it again, yeah! However, I have contacted this seller twice to get information on his return policy and what exactly it means to have a "refurbished" camera.  He has not responded and this concerns me. So, sadly I won't be purchasing this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Samsung S630 6 MP 3x Optical/5x Digital Zoom Camera General Features: Color: Red 6 Mega pixel
Lens Type: 1/25-inch CCD 2.5-inch color TFT LCD 3x Optical Zoom 5x Digital Zoom TTL auto focus
Mechanical and Electronic shutter Shutter Speed: 1 ~ 1/1,500 sec.(Manual : 8 ~ 1/1,500 sec.)
Exposure Control: Program AE; Metering : Multi, Spot
Flash Modes: Auto, Auto Red-eye reduction, Fill-in flash, Slow sync, Flash off
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung S630 6MP 3x Optical/5x Digital Zoom Camera (Red)
